channel.title: Comments on: What Gym Exercises Will Improve My Tennis Serve?
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Phil
item.dc:creator: Phil
item.description: I like the article and I will try this with a positive approach. I am 69 and a bit heavy but I still play singles. Years back I beat the number one 4.5 singles player in USTA regionals so at best I was a so so 5.0 player but mostly 4.5 and at my age now a 4.0. I am tall (6'3" ) and I used to hit a 108 mph serve. I struggle to reach 80 mph now. Some older and shorter players hit bigger serves so I am a little annoyed.
item.content:encoded:
I like the article and I will try this with a positive approach.
I am 69 and a bit heavy but I still play singles. Years back I beat the number one 4.5 singles player in USTA regionals so at best I was a so so 5.0 player but mostly 4.5 and at my age now a 4.0. I am tall (6’3″ ) and I used to hit a 108 mph serve. I struggle to reach 80 mph now. Some older and shorter players hit bigger serves so I am a little annoyed.
